anya-e0803n10:5: Itthī thī ca pabhā bhā ca, girā rā pavanaṁ vanaṁ;
anya-e0803n10:6: Udakañca dakaṁ kañca, vitakko iti cādayo.
anya-e0803n10:7: Bhū bhūmi ceva araññaṁ, araññānīti cādayo;
anya-e0803n10:8: Paññā paññāṇaṁ ñāṇañca, iccādī ca tidhā siyuṁ.
anya-e0803n10:9: Ko vi sā ceva bhā rā ca, thī dhī ku bhū tatheva kaṁ;
anya-e0803n10:10: Khaṁ go mo mā ca saṁ yaṁ taṁ, kimiccādī ca ekikāti.
anya-e0803n10:11: Ayaṁ liṅgattayamissako nāmikapadamālāuddeso. Tatra itthī, itthī, itthiyo. Itthiṁ…pe… bhotiyo itthiyo.
anya-e0803n10:12: Thī thī, thiyo. Thiṁ, thī, thiyo. Thiyā, thīhi, thībhi. Thiyā, thīnaṁ. Thiyā, thīhi, thībhi. Thiyā, thīnaṁ. Thiyā, thiyaṁ, thīsu. Bhoti thi, bhotiyo thī, bhotiyo thiyo. Ettha –
anya-e0803n10:15: Thiyā guyhaṁ na saṁseyya; Thīnaṁ bhāvo durājāno’’ti
anya-e0803n10:17: Pabhā, pabhā, pabhāyo. Pabhaṁ…pe… bhotiyo pabhāyo.
anya-e0803n10:18_0: Bhā, bhā, bhāyo. Bhaṁ, bhā, bhāyo. Bhāya, bhāhi, bhābhi. Bhāya, bhānaṁ. Bhāya, bhāhi,
anya-e0803n10:18_1: bhābhi. Bhāya, bhānaṁ. Bhāya, bhāyaṁ, bhāsu. Bhoti bhe, bhotiyo bhā, bhotiyo bhāyo.
anya-e0803n10:19: Girā , girā, girāyo. Giraṁ…pe… bhotiyo girāyo. ‘‘Vācā girā byappatho. Ye vohaṁ kittayissāmi, girāhi anupubbaso’’ti imāni girāsaddassa itthiliṅgabhāve nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0803n10:20: Suvaṇṇavācako rāsaddo pulliṅgo, idha pana saddavācako rāsaddo itthiliṅgo.
anya-e0803n10:21: Rā, rā, rāyo. Raṁ, rā, rāyo. Rāya, rāhi, rābhi. Rāya, rānaṁ. Rāya, rāhi, rābhi. Rāya, rānaṁ. Rāya, rāyaṁ, rāsu. Bhoti re, bhotiyo rā, bhotiyo rāyo.
anya-e0803n10:22_0: Rā vuccati saddo. Aggaññasuttaṭīkāyañhi ‘‘rā saddo tiyati chijjati etthāti ratti,
anya-e0803n10:22_1: sattānaṁ saddassa vūpasamakālo’’ti vuttaṁ. Tasmā rāsaddassa saddavācakatte ‘‘rattī’’ti padaṁ nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n10:23: Pavanaṁ, pavanāni, pavanā. Pavanaṁ, pavanāni, pavane.
anya-e0803n10:24: Vanaṁ, vanāni, vanā. Vanaṁ, vanāni, vane. Sesaṁ sabbaṁ neyyaṁ.
anya-e0803n10:25_0: Pavana vanasaddā kadāci samānatthā kadāci bhinnatthā. Te hi araññavācakatte samānatthā
anya-e0803n10:25_1: ‘‘te dhamme paripūrento, pavanaṁ pāvisiṁ tadā. Saputto pāvisiṁ vana’’ntiādīsu. Yathākkamaṁ
anya-e0803n10:26: Udakaṁ, udakāni, udakā. Udakaṁ, udakāni, udake.
anya-e0803n10:27: Dakaṁ, dakāni, dakā. Dakaṁ, dakāni, dake. Sesaṁ sabbaṁ neyyaṁ.
anya-e0803n10:28_0: ‘‘Ambapakkaṁ dakaṁ sītaṁ. Thalajā dakajā pupphā’’tiādīnettha nidassanapadāni. ‘‘Nīlodaṁ
anya-e0803n10:28_1: vanamajjhato. Mahodadhi. Udabindunipātena, udakumbhopi pūratī’’ti pāḷippadesesu pana
anya-e0803n10:28_3: ‘‘rittassa’’nti saddena rittassādattho viya. Pāḷiyañhi kevalo udasaddo na diṭṭhapubbo.
anya-e0803n10:29_0: Kaṁ, kāni, kā. Kaṁ, kāni, ke. Kena, kehi, kebhi. Kassa, kānaṁ. Kā, kasmā, kamhā,
anya-e0803n10:29_1: kehi, kebhi. Kassa, kānaṁ. Ke, kasmiṁ, kamhi, kesu. Bho ka, bhavanto kā, bhavanto
anya-e0803n10:29_2: kāni. Bhosaddena vā bahuvacanaṁ yojetabbaṁ ‘‘bho kāni, bho kā’’ti.
anya-e0803n10:30_0: Ettha kaṁ vuccati udakaṁ sīsaṁ sukhañca. Atra ‘‘kantāro kandaro kevaṭṭā kesā karuṇā
anya-e0803n10:30_1: nāko’’tiādīni payogāni veditabbāni. Tatra kantāroti kaṁ vuccati udakaṁ, tena taritabbo
anya-e0803n10:30_2: atikkamitabboti kantāro, nirudakappadeso. Corakantārantiādīsu pana rūḷhiyā duggamanaṭṭhānepi
anya-e0803n10:30_3: kantārasaddo pavattatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Kandaroti etthāpi kaṁ vuccati udakaṁ, tena dārito
anya-e0803n10:30_4: bhinnoti kandaro. Kevaṭṭātiādīsu pana ke udake vattanato gahaṇatthaṁ pavattanato
anya-e0803n10:30_5: kevaṭṭā. Ke sīse senti uppajjantīti kesā. Kaṁ sukhaṁ rundhatīti karuṇā. Nākoti saggo.
anya-e0803n10:30_6: Kanti hi sukhaṁ, na kaṁ akaṁ, dukkhaṁ, taṁ natthi etthāti nākoti attho gahetabbo
anya-e0803n10:30_7: . Yathettha itthīsaddādīnaṁ nāmikapadamālā yojitā, evaṁ ‘‘vitakko vicāro ābhā padīpo’’tiādīnampi yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n10:31_0: Bhū, bhū, bhuyo. Bhuṁ, bhū, bhuyo. Bhuyā, bhūhi, bhūbhi. Bhuyā, bhūnaṁ. Bhuyā, bhūhi,
anya-e0803n10:31_1: bhūbhi. Bhuyā, bhūnaṁ. Bhuyā, bhuyaṁ, bhūsu. Bhoti bhu, bhotiyo bhū, bhotiyo bhuyo.
anya-e0803n10:31_2: Ettha ca ‘‘bhūruho bhūpālo bhūbhujo bhūtala’’nti nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0803n10:34: Araññānī vuccati mahāaraññaṁ, ‘‘gahapatānī’’ti padamiva inīpaccayavasena sādhetabbaṁ padaṁ itthiliṅgañca. ‘‘Araññānī’’ti hi aṭṭhakathāpāṭhopi dissati.
anya-e0803n10:35_0: Araññānī, araññānī, araññāniyo. Araññāniṁ, araññānī, araññāniyo. Araññāniyā, araññānīhi,
anya-e0803n10:35_1: araññānībhi. Araññāniyā, araññānīnaṁ. Araññāniyā, araññānīhi, araññānībhi. Araññāniyā,
anya-e0803n10:35_2: araññānīnaṁ. Araññāniyā, araññāniyaṁ, araññānīsu. Bhoti araññāni, bhotiyo araññānī, bhotiyo araññāniyo.
anya-e0803n10:36_0: Yathettha uttarādhikavasena yojitā, evaṁ ‘‘sabhā, sabhāya’’ntiādīsupi yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n10:36_1: Sabhāyanti sabhā eva , liṅgabyattayavasena pana evaṁ vuttaṁ. ‘‘Sabhāye vā dvāramūle
anya-e0803n10:37: Paññā, paññā, paññāyo. Paññaṁ, paññā, paññāyo. Paññāya.
anya-e0803n10:38: Paññāṇaṁ, paññāṇāni, paññāṇā. Paññāṇaṁ, paññāṇāni, paññāṇe. Paññāṇena.
anya-e0803n10:39: ‘‘Tathā hi bhante bhagavato sīlapaññāṇaṁ. Sādhu paññāṇavā naro’’tiādīnettha nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0803n10:40: Ñāṇaṁ, ñāṇāni, ñāṇā. Ñāṇaṁ, ñāṇāni, ñāṇe. Ñāṇena. Sesaṁ sabbaṁ neyyaṁ. ‘‘Aggi aggini gini’’iccādīsupi uttarādhikavasena nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n10:41: Ko vī sādīsupi ekakkharesu ko vuccati brahmā vāto ca sarīrañca, tassa tabbācakatte ime payogā. Seyyathidaṁ?
anya-e0803n10:44_0: Kakudharukkho. Karajakāyo’’ iccevamādayo. Tattha kamoḷialisevitanti vandantānaṁ anekasatānaṁ
anya-e0803n10:44_1: brahmānaṁ moḷibhamarasevitanti kavayo icchanti. Kakudharukkhoti ettha pana ko vuccati
anya-e0803n10:44_2: vāto, tassa yo kujjhati, vātarogāpanayanavasena taṁ nivāreti, tasmā so rukkho kakudhoti
anya-e0803n10:44_3: vuccatībhi ācariyā. Karajakāyoti ettha tu ko vuccati sarīraṁ, tattha pavatto rajo
anya-e0803n10:44_4: karajo. Kiṁ taṁ ? Sukkasoṇitaṁ. Tañhi ‘‘rāgo rajo, na ca pana reṇu vuccatī’’ti evaṁ
anya-e0803n10:44_6: vuccati. Tena sukkasoṇitasaṅkhātena karajena sambhūto kāyo karajakāyoti ācariyā.
anya-e0803n10:44_7: Tathā hi ‘‘kāyo mātāpettikasambhavo’’ti vutto, mahāassapūrasuttaṭīkāyaṁ pana ‘‘kariyati
anya-e0803n10:44_8: gabbhāsaye khipiyatīti karo, sambhavo. Karato jātoti karajo, mātāpettikasambhavoti
anya-e0803n10:44_9: attho. Mātuādīnaṁ saṇṭhāpanavasena karato jātoti apare, ubhayathāpi karajakāyanti
anya-e0803n10:44_10: catusantatirūpamāhā’’ti vuttaṁ. Ayaṁ panattho idha nādhippeto, purimoyevattho adhippeto kasaddādhikārattā.
anya-e0803n10:45: Ko, kā. Kaṁ, ke. Kena, kehi, kebhi. Kassa, kānaṁ. Kā, kasmā, kamhā, kehi, kebhi. Kassa, kānaṁ. Ke, kasmiṁ, kamhi, kesu. Bho ka, bhavanto kā.
anya-e0803n10:46: Tatra vi vuccati pakkhī. Tathā hi pakkhīnaṁ issaro supaṇṇarājā vindoti kathiyati. Etamatthañhi sandhāya pubbācariyenapi ayaṁ gāthā bhāsitā –
anya-e0803n10:49: Tattha vīnaṁ indoti vindo, pakkhijātiyā jātānaṁ supaṇṇānaṁ rājāti attho.
anya-e0803n10:50: Viṁ, vī, vayo. Viṁ, vī, vayo. Vinā, vīhi, vībhi. Vissa, vino, vīnaṁ. Vinā, vismā, vimhā, vīhi, vībhi. Vissa, vino, vīnaṁ. Vismiṁ, vimhi, vīsu. Bho vi, bhavanto vayo.
anya-e0803n10:51_0: Sā vuccati sunakho, ‘‘mātā me atthi, sā mayā posetabbā’’tiādīsu pana sāsaddo sabbanāmikapariyāpanno
anya-e0803n10:51_1: parammukhavacano tasaddena sambhūto daṭṭhabbo. Sāsaddassa bhā rā thī bhū kasaddānañca
anya-e0803n10:52: Dhī vuccati paññā. Ettha ca ‘‘amacce tāta jānāhi, dhīre atthassa kovide’’ti. ‘‘Dhīmā, dhīmati, sudhī, sudhinī, dhīyutta’’nti ca ādīni nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0803n10:53: Dhī, dhī, dhiyo. Dhiṁ, dhī, dhiyo. Dhiyā, dhīhi, dhībhi. Dhiyā, dhīnaṁ. Dhiyā, dhīhi, dhībhi. Dhiyā, dhīnaṁ. Dhiyā, dhiyaṁ, dhīsu. Bhoti dhi, bhotiyo dhī, bhotiyo dhiyo.
anya-e0803n10:54_0: Ku vuccati pathavī. Ettha ca ‘‘kudālo. Kumudaṁ. Kuñjaro’’ti imāni nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0803n10:54_1: Tatra kuṁ pathaviṁ dālayati padāleti bhindati etenāti kudālo. Kuyaṁ pathaviyaṁ modatīti
anya-e0803n10:54_2: kumudaṁ. Kuṁ jaratīti kuñjaro. Tathā hi vimānavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘kuṁ pathaviṁ
anya-e0803n10:55: Ku, kū, kuyo. Kuṁ, kū, kuyo. Kuyā, kūhi, kūbhi. Kuyā, kūnaṁ. Kuyā, kūhi, kūbhi. Kuyā, kūnaṁ. Kuyā, kuyaṁ, kūsu. Bhoti ku, bhotiyo kū, bhotiyo kuyo.
anya-e0803n10:57: Saggaṭṭhānampi khaṁ vuttaṁ, suññattampi ca khaṁ mataṁ.
anya-e0803n10:58_0: Tatrindriyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṁ gatinivāsabhāvato ‘‘kha’’nti vuccati, ākāsaṁ vivittaṭṭhena.
anya-e0803n10:58_1: Saggo katasucaritehi ekantena gantabbatāya ‘‘kha’’nti saṅkhaṁ gacchati. ‘‘Khago yathā
anya-e0803n10:58_2: hi rukkhagge, nilīyantova sākhino. Sākhaṁ ghaṭṭetī’’ti ca, ‘‘khe nimmito acari aṭṭhasataṁ
anya-e0803n10:59_0: Khaṁ, khāni, khā. Khaṁ, khāni, khe. Khena, khehi, khebhi. Khassa, khānaṁ. Khā, khasmā,
anya-e0803n10:59_1: khamhā, khehi, khebhi. Khassa, khānaṁ. Khe, khasmiṁ, khamhi, khesu. Bho kha, bhavanto
anya-e0803n10:61: Go goṇe cindriye bhūmyaṁ, vacane ceva buddhiyaṁ;
anya-e0803n10:63: Tesu atthesu goṇe thi-pumā ca itare pumā.
anya-e0803n10:64_0: Tathā hi ‘‘gosu duyhamānāsu gato. Gopañcamo’’tiādīsu gosaddo goṇe vattati. Gocaroti
anya-e0803n10:64_1: etthindriyepi vattati gāvo cakkhādīnindriyāni caranti etthāti gocaro. Tathā hi porāṇā
anya-e0803n10:64_2: kathayiṁsu ‘‘gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gocaro viya gocaro, abhiṇhaṁ caritabbaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0803n10:64_3: Gāvovācakkhādīnindriyāni, tehi caritabbaṭṭhānaṁ gocaro’’ti. ‘‘Gomatiṁ gotamaṁ name’’ti
anya-e0803n10:64_4: porāṇakaviracanāyaṁ pana pathaviyaṁ vattati. ‘‘Bhūripaññaṁ gotamaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁvandāmī’’ti
anya-e0803n10:64_6: khettarakkhaṁ, kasirakkhanti vuttaṁ hoti. Pathavī hi ‘‘go’’ti vuccati, tappabhedo
anya-e0803n10:65_0: ‘‘Gottavasena gotamo’’ti ettha tu vacane buddhiyañca vattati. Tenāhu porāṇā ‘‘gaṁ
anya-e0803n10:65_1: tāyatīti gottaṁ. Gotamoti hi pavattamānaṁ gaṁ vacanaṁ buddhiñca tāyati ekaṁsikavisayatāya
anya-e0803n10:65_2: rakkhatīti gottaṁ. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati, evaṁ
anya-e0803n10:65_3: abhidhānaṁ abhidheyyabhūtena, tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni tāyati rakkhatīti
anya-e0803n10:65_4: vuccati. Ko pana soti? Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṁ tassa kulassa ādipurisasamudāgataṁ
anya-e0803n10:65_5: taṁkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṁ sāmaññarūpanti daṭṭhabba’’nti. Tathā hi taṁgottajātā
anya-e0803n10:65_6: suddhodanamahārājādayopi gotamotveva vuccanti. Bhena bhagavā attano pitaraṁ suddhodanamahārājānaṁ
anya-e0803n10:65_7: ‘‘atikkantavarā kho gotama tathāgatā’’ti avoca. Vessavaṇopi mahārājā bhagavantaṁ
anya-e0803n10:65_8: ‘‘vijjācaraṇasampannaṁ, buddhaṁ vandāma gotama’’nti avoca, āyasmāpi vaṅgīso āyasmantaṁ
anya-e0803n10:65_9: ānandaṁ ‘‘sādhu nibbāpanaṁ brūhi, anukampāya gotamā’’ti avoca. Evaṁ idaṁ sāmaññarūpaṁ
anya-e0803n10:65_10: gaṁ tāyatīti gottanti vuttaṁ. Taṁ pana gotamagottakassapagottādivasena bahuvidhaṁ.
anya-e0803n10:66_0: Tathā gosaddo ādicce vattati. ‘‘Gogottaṁ gotamaṁ name’’ti porāṇakaviracanā ettha
anya-e0803n10:66_1: nidassanaṁ, ādiccabandhuṁ gotamaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ vandāmīti attho. Ādiccopi hi gotamagotte
anya-e0803n10:66_2: jāto bhagavāpi, evaṁ tena samānagottatāya tattha tattha ‘‘ādiccabandhū’’tiādinā bhagavato
anya-e0803n10:66_3: thomanā dissati ‘‘pucchāmi taṁ ādiccabandhu, vivekaṁ santipadañca mahesī’’ti ca,
anya-e0803n10:66_5: ca. ‘‘Uṇhagū’’ti ettha pana gosaddo rasmiyaṁ vattati. Uṇhā gāvo rasmiyo etassāti
anya-e0803n10:66_6: uṇhagū, sūriyo. Pubbācariyāpi hi chandovicitisatthe imamevatthaṁ byākariṁsu.
anya-e0803n10:67_0: ‘‘Gosītacandana’’nti ettha pānīye vattati. Gosaddena hi jalaṁ vuccati. Go viya sītaṁ
anya-e0803n10:67_1: candanaṁ, tasmiṁ pana uddhanato uddharitapakkuthitatelamhi pakkhitte taṅkhaṇaññeva
anya-e0803n10:68_0: Ettheke vadanti ‘‘kasmā bho ‘gopadatthe vattamāno gosaddo itthiliṅgo ceva pulliṅgo
anya-e0803n10:68_1: cā’ti vadatha, kasmā ca pana ‘indriyapathavīvacanabuddhisūriyarasmipānīyesu vattamāno
anya-e0803n10:68_2: pulliṅgo’ti vadatha, etesu sūriyatthe vattamāno pulliṅgo hotu, nanu indriyavacanapānīyesu
anya-e0803n10:68_3: vattamānena pana gosaddena napuṁsakaliṅgena bhavitabbaṁ, pathavībuddhirasmīsu vattamānena
anya-e0803n10:68_5: napuṁsakitthiliṅgavasena niddesassa dassanato’’ti? Tanna, niyamābhāvato. Itthipadatthe
anya-e0803n10:68_6: vattamānassāpi hi sato kassaci saddassa pulliṅgavasena niddeso dissati yathā ‘‘orodho’’ti.
anya-e0803n10:68_7: Purisapadatthe vattamānassāpi ca sato kassaci itthiliṅgavasena niddeso dissati, yathā
anya-e0803n10:68_8: ‘‘atthakāmosi me yakkha, hitakāmāsi devate’’ti. Itthipurisapadatthesu pana avattamānānampi
anya-e0803n10:68_9: sataṁ kesañci saddānaṁ ekasmiṁyeva ñāṇādiatthe vattamānānaṁ itthipumanapuṁsakaliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n10:68_10: niddeso dissati yathā ‘‘paññā amoho ñāṇa’’nti, ‘‘taṭaṁtaṭītaṭo’’ti ca. Tathā hi anitthibhūtopi
anya-e0803n10:68_11: samāno ‘‘mātulā’’ti itthiliṅgavasena rukkhopi nāmaṁ labhati, tabbasena nagarampi.
anya-e0803n10:68_12: Tenāha cakkavattisuttaṭīkāyaṁ ‘‘mātulāti itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmo eko rukkho,
anya-e0803n10:68_13: tāya āsannappadese māpitattā nagarampi ‘mātulā’tveva paññāyittha. Tena vuttaṁ mātulāyanti
anya-e0803n10:70_0: Mo vuccati cando, aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana ‘‘mā vuccati cando’’ti ākārantapāṭho dissati,
anya-e0803n10:70_1: okārantapāṭhena tena bhavitabbaṁ sakkaṭabhāsāya ekakkharakosato nayaṁ gahetvā ‘‘mo
anya-e0803n10:70_2: sivo candimā cevā’’ti okārantavasena vattabbattā. Ettha ca okārantavasena vuttassa
anya-e0803n10:70_3: masaddassa candavācakatte ‘‘puṇṇamī, puṇṇamā’’ti ca nidassanapadāni. Tattha puṇṇo
anya-e0803n10:70_4: mo etthāti puṇṇamī, evaṁ puṇṇamā, rattāpekkhaṁ itthiliṅgavacanaṁ. Ettha pana ‘‘visākhapuṇṇamāya
anya-e0803n10:70_5: rattiyā paṭhamayāmepubbenivāsaṁ anussarī’’ti idaṁ nidassanaṁ. Ettha siyā – yadi ‘‘puṇṇamā’’ti
anya-e0803n10:75_0: Ādīsu kathaṁ ‘‘puṇṇamāye’’ti padasiddhīti? Yakārassa yekārādesavasena. Dhammissarena
anya-e0803n10:75_1: hi bhagavatā ‘‘puṇṇamāyā’’ti vattabbe ‘‘puṇṇamāye’’ti vadatā yakārassa ṭhāne yekāro
anya-e0803n10:75_2: paṭhito itthiliṅgavisaye ttākārassa ṭhāne ttekāro viya, nīkārassa ṭhāne nekāro viya
anya-e0803n10:75_3: ca. Tathā hi yathā ‘‘abyayataṁ vilapasi viratte kosiyāyane’’ti imasmiṁ rādhajātake
anya-e0803n10:75_4: ‘‘virattā’’ti vattabbe ‘‘viratte’’ti vadantena ttākārassa ṭhāne ttekāro paṭhito,
anya-e0803n10:75_5: ‘‘kosiyāyanī’’ti ca vattabbe ‘‘kosiyāyane’’ti vadantena nīkārassa ṭhāne nekāro paṭhito.
anya-e0803n10:75_6: Evaṁ ‘‘puṇṇamāyā’’ti vattabbe ‘‘puṇṇamāye’’ti vadatā yakārassa ṭhāne yekāro paṭhito.
anya-e0803n10:75_8: vattabbe ‘‘dakkhitāye’’ti vadatā yakārassa ṭhāne yekāro paṭhito, evamidhāpi. Yathā
anya-e0803n10:75_9: pana ‘‘sabhāye vā dvāramūle vā’’ti ettha ‘‘sabhāya’’nti liṅgabyattayavasena sabhā
anya-e0803n10:75_10: vuttā, na tathā idha ‘‘puṇṇamāya’’nti liṅgabyattayena puṇṇamā vuttā, atha kho ‘‘puṇṇamā’’ti
anya-e0803n10:75_11: ākārantitthiliṅgavasena vuttā. Tathā hi ‘‘puṇṇamāyo’’ti padaṁ yakāraṭṭhāne yekāruccāraṇavasena
anya-e0803n10:76_0: Mā vuccati sirī. Tathā hi vidvamukhamaṇḍanaṭīkāyaṁ ‘‘mālinī’’ti padassatthaṁ vadatā
anya-e0803n10:76_1: ‘‘mā vuccati lakkhī, alinī bhamarī’’ti vuttaṁ. Lakkhīsaddo ca sirīsaddena samānattho,
anya-e0803n10:76_2: tena ‘‘mā vuccati sirī’’ti attho amhehi anumato, tathā porāṇehipi ‘‘maṁ siriṁ dhāreti
anya-e0803n10:76_3: vidadhāti cāti mandhātā’’ti attho pakāsito, tasmā ‘‘mālinī mandhātā’’ti ca imānettha
anya-e0803n10:76_4: nidassanapadāni. Tatra pulliṅgassa tāva masaddassa ayaṁ nāmikapadamālā –
anya-e0803n10:77: Mo, mā. Maṁ, me. Mena, mehi, mebhi. Massa, mānaṁ. Mā, masmā, mamhā, mehi, mebhi. Massa, mānaṁ. Me, masmiṁ, mamhi, mesu. Bho ma, bhavanto mā.
anya-e0803n10:79: Mā, mā, māyo. Maṁ, mā, māyo. Māya, māhi, mābhi. Māya, mānaṁ. Māya, māhi, mābhi. Māya, mānaṁ. Māya, māyaṁ, māsu. Bhoti me, bhotiyo māyo.
anya-e0803n10:80: Ettha pana sirīvācako māsaddo ca saddavācako rāsaddo cāti ime samānagatikā ekakkharattā niccamākārantapakatikattā itthiliṅgattā ca.
anya-e0803n10:81_0: Tatra saṁ vuccati santacitto puriso. Yaṁ loke ‘‘sappuriso’’ti ca, ‘‘ariyo’’ti ca,
anya-e0803n10:81_1: ‘‘paṇḍito’’ti ca vadanti, tassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ yadidaṁ ‘‘sa’’nti. Evaṁ sappurisāriyapaṇḍitavācakassa
anya-e0803n10:81_2: saṁsaddassa paccattavacanavasena atthibhāve ‘‘sameti asatā asa’’nti idaṁ payoganidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n10:81_3: Ettha hi ‘‘na saṁ asa’’nti samāsacintāya sappurisāsappurisapadatthā saṁ asaṁsaddehi
anya-e0803n10:81_4: vuttāti ñāyanti, tasmā ‘‘sappurisapadattho paccattavacanena saṁsaddena vutto natthī’’ti
anya-e0803n10:81_5: vacanaṁ na vattabbaṁ. Ye ‘‘natthī’’ti vadanti, tesaṁ vacanaṁ na gahetabbaṁ. Nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n10:81_6: panassa ‘‘saṁ, santaṁ, sante’’tiādinā heṭṭhā pakāsitā. Napuṁsakaliṅgatte saṁ vuccati
anya-e0803n10:81_8: nidassanapadāni. Tattha manussassa saṁ manussassaṁ. Evaṁ parassa saṁ parassaṁ. Sabbassa
anya-e0803n10:81_9: saṁ sabbassaṁ. Tassa haraṇaṁ parassaharaṇaṁ sabbassaharaṇanti samāso. Tathā saṁ vuccati
anya-e0803n10:81_10: sukhaṁ santi ca. Vuttañhi tabbācakattaṁ porāṇakaviracanāyaṁ –
anya-e0803n10:84_0: Tasmā ayamettha gāthā, ‘‘sakalalokasaṅkaro dīpaṅkaro’’ti ettha ‘‘saṅkaro’’ti padañcanidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n10:84_1: ‘‘Saṁ, sāni, sā. Saṁ, sāni, se. Sena’’iccādi pubbe pakāsitanayena ñeyyaṁ. Ettha ca
anya-e0803n10:84_2: sotūnaṁ sugatamatavare kosallajananatthaṁ samāsantagatassa saṁsaddassa nāmikapadamālaṁ
anya-e0803n10:85_0: Manussassaṁ, manussassāni, manussassā. Manussassaṁ, manussassāni, manussasse. Manussassena,
anya-e0803n10:85_1: manussassehi, manussassebhi. Manussassassa, manussassānaṁ. Manussassā, manussassasmā,
anya-e0803n10:85_2: manussassamhā, manussassehi, manussassebhi. Manussassassa, manussassānaṁ. Manussasse,
anya-e0803n10:85_3: manussassasmiṁ, manussassamhi, manussassesu. Bho manussassa, bhonto manussassāni,
anya-e0803n10:85_4: manussassā. Esa nayo ‘‘parassaṁ sabbassa’’ntiādīsupi, sabbānetāni padāni abhidheyyaliṅgānīti gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n10:88: Iccevaṁ heṭṭhā uddiṭṭhānaṁ ko vi sādīnaṁ nāmikapadamālā saddhiṁ atthantaranidassanapadehi vibhattā. Tatridaṁ liṅgavavatthānaṁ –
anya-e0803n10:89: Ko vi sā honti pulliṅge, bhā rā thī dhī ku bhū thiyaṁ;
anya-e0803n10:90: Kaṁ khaṁ napuṁsake go tu, pume cevitthiliṅgake.
anya-e0803n10:91: Mo pume itthiliṅge mā, saṁ pume ca napuṁsake;
anya-e0803n10:92: Yaṁ taṁ kimiti sabbatra, liṅgesveva pavattare.
anya-e0803n10:94_1: paramasaṇhasukhumatthesu payogesu asammohatthaṁ suvaṇṇatale sīhavijambhanena kesarīsīhassa
anya-e0803n10:94_2: vijambhanamiva tepiṭake buddhavacane ñāṇavijambhanena vijambhanatthañca adhikūnekakkharavasena
anya-e0803n10:95: Sadde bhavanti kusalā na tu keci atthe,
anya-e0803n10:96: Atthe bhavanti kusalā na tu keci sadde.
